name: Luci4
description: '''James Dear''' (born August 2, 2002), professionally known as '''Luci4''', is an American rapper, songwriter and record producer based in [[Hemet, California]], known for his songs, which blew up on [[TikTok]] in 2021, and got him signed to [[Atlantic Records]]. Originally starting as a producer under the moniker, "4jay," producing songs such as "[[Santana World|Gotta Blast]]" by [[Tay-K]]. His debut single, "[[Bodypartz]]", received a gold certification by the [[Recording Industry Association of America]], following a surge of the song's popularity on [[TikTok]].
